alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 10:05PM MST until January 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM FRIDAY TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...From 5 AM Friday to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage, especially in burn scar areas. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft
